summary: The self-driving car is moving on a city road with buildings on both sides. From 0.0s to 6.0s, the car is driving straight. At 6.0s, a male motorcyclist wearing a white helmet and dark clothing is seen on the right side of the road. From 7.0s to 11.4s, the car approaches an intersection with a bus stopped on the left side. A male wearing a blue jacket is crossing the road from left to right in front of the bus. The car slows down to prepare to stop at the intersection.
